comments: Abolished 1.4.1928 and added to the parish of Croydon.

That part which until 1.4.1933 formed parts of the parishes of 
    Beddington, Coulsdon, Morden, Wallington and Woodmansterne. See also Table 
    2, note (g).

That part which until 1.4.1933 formed part of the parish of 
    Coulsdon. See also Table 2, note (i).

That part which until 1.4.1933 formed part of the parish of 
    Morden. See also Table 2, note (g).

Abolished 1.4.1965 and added to the London Borough of 
    Croydon. 
    See also Table 2, notes (g), (j) and (k).
Transferred from Surrey to Kent on 1.4.1901. See also Table 2, note (f).

That part which until 1.4.1933 formed part of the parish of 
    Morden. See also Table 2, note (g).

That part which until 1.4.1904 formed part of the parish of Mitcham. 
    See also Table 2, note (d).

That part which until 1.4.1933 formed part of the parishes of 
    Coulsdon and Sanderstead. See also Table 2, note (i).

That part which until 1.10.1898 formed part of the parish of 
    Merton. See also Table 2, note (a).
